basic_info.name: Godavari Global University FAQs
description: Ques. Are there any foreign collaborations by Godavari Global University?

faqs.question: Are there any foreign opportunities for students at GGU?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, GGU is a great place for those looking for opportunities abroad with its integrated MS programs with foreign universities and multiple students exchange programs with prestigious institutes across the globe.

faqs.question: Does the institute provide online admission?
faqs.answer: Ans.The application form can be downloaded online or obtained from the college prospectus, but the candidates must submit the application form physically at their college office. Applications are not accepted online.

faqs.question: What is the process of seat allocation?
faqs.answer: Ans.70% of seat intake is based on the rank secured on EAMCET/JEE by eligible candidates. The remaining 30% seats are allocated on basis of merit to candidates out of the state and NRI/NRI sponsored candidates. There are 15% supplementary seats for PIO/Foreign Nationals/CWG.

faqs.question: How do we contact the college for further details?
faqs.answer: Ans.The mailing address of the college is Godavari Global University, NH - 16, Chaitanya Knowledge City, Rajahmundry - 533296, Andhra Pradesh, India. You can also contact them at 9949993483.

faqs.question: How is the campus life at GGU?
faqs.answer: Ans.GGU is the abode for staff and students with different cultures. Diversified student community spread over 13 Countries and 15 Indian states, make GGU their unique destination to enrich their knowledge and skills. GGU provides both air-conditioned and non-air-conditioned suites, excellent dining with menu catering to South Indian, North Indian and International students. The boarding rooms are spacious, well-ventilated, clean and comfortable. Entertainment and workout zones for people from different backgrounds helps them come together and foster long- lasting bonds, that successfully creates a comfortable environment for holistic development. Each student will be provided with a well-planned reading/working space. Individual cupboards are made available for the inmates of the hostel with lock-and-key facility to keep their valuables safe and secure.

faqs.question: Are there any foreign collaborations by Godavari Global University?
faqs.answer: Ans.GGU has signed Memorandums of Understanding (MOUs) with several prestigious universities worldwide for certification programs, research collaborations, and student exchange programs. These partnerships include:University of California, Berkeley, USARyazan State University, RussiaAachen University, GermanyGerman Varsity, GermanyUniversity Innovation Fellows (UIF), Stanford UniversityThese collaborations aim to enhance academic excellence, promote research collaboration, and provide students with opportunities for international exposure and learning. Through these partnerships, GGU students and faculty members benefit from exchange programs, joint research projects, and access to resources and expertise from these renowned institutions.

Section.name: About Godavari Global University - [GGU]
Section.description:
Godavari Global University (formaly known as Godavari institute of Engineering and technology- GIET) is accredited by NAAC ‘A++' with 3.58/4 in the 3rd Cycle. GIET was established in the year 1998 and was confered with Godavari Global University status in the year 2024. However, GIET received many prestigious awards & recognitions from reputed agencies in India and abroad. It Ranked in the band 201-500 Engineering in NIRF ranking consecutively for 4 years since 2019. Furthermore, the University is recognized Under Sections 2(f) and 12(B) by UGC Act 1956.
The University offers a wide range of courses across different schools i.e.: School of Computing, School of Engineering, School of Sciences and School of Health Sciences. GGU offers B.Tech, B.Sc., B.Sc. (Hon's), BCA & BPT as undergraduate courses and M.Tech, MCA and MBA as postgraduate courses. Admission to the courses are based on entrance examination. Further, GGU has signed Memorandums of Understanding (MOUs) with several prestigious universities worldwide for certification programs, research collaborations, and student exchange programs such as German Varsity, Staffordshire University, PRY, and many more.

Ques. Are there any foreign opportunities for students at GGU?
Ans. Yes, GGU is a great place for those looking for opportunities abroad with its integrated MS programs with foreign universities and multiple students exchange programs with prestigious institutes across the globe.
Ques. Does the institute provide online admission?
Ans. The application form can be downloaded online or obtained from the college prospectus, but the candidates must submit the application form physically at their college office. Applications are not accepted online.
Ques. What is the process of seat allocation?
Ans. 70% of seat intake is based on the rank secured on EAMCET/JEE by eligible candidates. The remaining 30% seats are allocated on basis of merit to candidates out of the state and NRI/NRI sponsored candidates. There are 15% supplementary seats for PIO/Foreign Nationals/CWG.
Ques. How do we contact the college for further details?
Ans. The mailing address of the college is Godavari Global University, NH - 16, Chaitanya Knowledge City, Rajahmundry - 533296, Andhra Pradesh, India. You can also contact them at 9949993483.
Ques. How is the campus life at GGU?
Ans. GGU is the abode for staff and students with different cultures. Diversified student community spread over 13 Countries and 15 Indian states, make GGU their unique destination to enrich their knowledge and skills. GGU provides both air-conditioned and non-air-conditioned suites, excellent dining with menu catering to South Indian, North Indian and International students. The boarding rooms are spacious, well-ventilated, clean and comfortable. Entertainment and workout zones for people from different backgrounds helps them come together and foster long- lasting bonds, that successfully creates a comfortable environment for holistic development. Each student will be provided with a well-planned reading/working space. Individual cupboards are made available for the inmates of the hostel with lock-and-key facility to keep their valuables safe and secure.
Ques. Are there any foreign collaborations by Godavari Global University?
Ans. GGU has signed Memorandums of Understanding (MOUs) with several prestigious universities worldwide for certification programs, research collaborations, and student exchange programs. These partnerships include:
These collaborations aim to enhance academic excellence, promote research collaboration, and provide students with opportunities for international exposure and learning. Through these partnerships, GGU students and faculty members benefit from exchange programs, joint research projects, and access to resources and expertise from these renowned institutions.

Ques. What is TECHWING at Godavari Global University?
Ans. TECHWING at GGU is more than a corporate hub; it's a specialized ecosystem that bridges the gap between academic curriculum and industry demands. GGU ensure that students are equipped with the critical skills needed for successful careers in the IT industry. The university’s approach to training is holistic, focusing on both hard and soft skills. By emphasizing technical knowledge alongside communication, teamwork, and problem-solving abilities, TECHWING prepares students for the challenges of the IT industry.
What sets TECHWING apart is the commitment to real-world knowledge and hands-on experience. Through advanced technologies, in-campus internships, and industry initiatives, we actively connect students with potential employers, facilitating valuable networking opportunities and enabling a seamless transition into the IT sector.
